content:
Announcement: Australian Base Profiles Implementation Guide v1.0.0 (Standard for Trial Use) http://hl7.org.au/fhir/base2018Oct
Ballot specification material is now up for 6 weeks ballot period please let others know it is their opportunity to review. All issues are to be collected online via the 'Issue & Feedback' link, bottom right of each page. HL7 Australia membership announcement is not far way and please use any other channels to interested parties to let them know now is the time to review.
Thanks to all of those involved in working groups, content production and review. The hope is to continue adding to the scope of this publication to provide a comprehensive guide across many use cases and support downstream activities like Argonaut Australia, provider directory and child health implementation guides effectively.

Having trouble with Issues & Feedback - just spins on Chrome. On Safari I get the pop-up, but when I submit an AJAX error is reported.
pasted image

If you are wanting to implement things using the technical artifacts, there were some minor issues with them that needed to be addressed, these have been resolved in the CI build - and the current CI Build of the PD spec has no known technical issues with it.
Hi @Michael Lawley is this still a problem? I am submitting from Chrome okay... Safari has a problem; i'll need to check that out...
Great, looks like it's working for me (at least from Chrome) now.

Reminder we have until the 28th November to formally respond to the balloted HL7 AU Base IG http://hl7.org.au/fhir/base2018Oct appreciate and issues or comments - feel free to distribute this to other interested parties
Today is the last day in the formal ballot response period for HL7 AU Base IG - get your comments and issues in for consideration by working groups.
